Package management

Class backEnd

java.lang.Object
management.backEnd
public class backEnd extends Object
This class will be used as a backend API for postgresql and Java Application connectivity for various operations regarding employee-database management application project
Author:
theak

      public boolean enter_emp_data​(String fname, String lname, int age)
      This function should be called to add a row to the employee database
      Parameters:
      fname - EmployeeFirstName Used to fill the database
      lname - EmployeeLastName Used to fill the database
      age - EmployeeAge Used to fill the database
      Returns:
      True/False according to completion of the event

    • addEmpToDept

      public boolean addEmpToDept​(int emp_id, int dept_id)
      This function should be called to add a row to the bridge relation database
      Parameters:
      emp_id - Integer Employ ID
      dept_id - Integer Department ID
      Returns:
      Boolean True When Employee Added else False

    • changeEmpDept

      public boolean changeEmpDept​(int emp_id, int olddept_id, int newdept_id)
      This function should be called to Change department of any employee from current department to a new one
      Parameters:
      emp_id - Integer Employee ID : This employee ID will be used to search employee's details
      olddept_id - Integer Old Department ID :This is the current department that is to be changed.
      newdept_id - Integer New Department ID : This is the new department that is to be alloted.
      Returns:
      True When department change is successful else false

    • complete_emp_table

      public ResultSet complete_emp_table()
      This function will be used to call the whole employee database and can also be used to update the Jtables.
      Returns:
      Whole Employ database in a ResultSet Object

    • dept_data

      public ResultSet dept_data​(int emp_id)
      This function is used to search for departments alloted to a employee using his employee ID
      Parameters:
      emp_id - This will be used to search department
      Returns:
      Departments alloted to a employee in ResultSet Object

    • searchUsingAnything

      public ResultSet searchUsingAnything​(String emp_id, String emp_fname, String emp_lname, String emp_age)
      This is a search engine designed for the database where you can fill any amount of detail you know about the employee and get the employee's details
      Parameters:
      emp_id - This is the employee ID used to search using ID
      emp_fname - This is the First name of the employee used to search
      emp_lname - This is the Last name of the employee used to search
      emp_age - This is the Age of the employee used to search
      Returns:
      Relevant Search Results according to the parameters entered in a ResultSet object

    • complete_dept_table

      public ResultSet complete_dept_table()
      Returns the Complete Department Table.
      Returns:
      ResultSet Object

    • delete_emp

      public boolean delete_emp​(int employeeID)
      Deletes the row containing employeeID from the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeID - Row containing this Employee ID will be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns true if deletion is successful else returns false

    • delete_dept

      public boolean delete_dept​(int departmentID)
      Deletes the row from the database with matching departmentID.
      Parameters:
      departmentID - Row with this Department ID will be deleted
      Returns:
      Returns true if departmentID deleted successfully or else returns false

    • searchDept

      public ResultSet searchDept​(String departmentID, String departmentName)
      Returns a ResultSet Object with matching table row content. Content can be searched using either departmentID or departmentName
      Parameters:
      departmentID - This Department ID will be searched
      departmentName - This Department Name will be searched
      Returns:
      ResultSet Object
